entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
